mean_cn: n. 不利，不利地位，弱点，弊端
mean_en: something that causes difficulty :something that makes someone or something worse or less likely to succeed than others
word_etyma: dis否定 + advantage优点 → disadvantage 缺点
sentence: The one ant is at a disadvantage against so many others.
sentence_trans: 这一只蚂蚁在和其他许多蚂蚁的对抗中处于劣势。
